factsTitle: Buy, Sell, and Auction Japanese Cars Globally
challenge: Developed a cross-platform mobile app to import/export cars from Japan to any country.
Built a real-time bidding auction system with countdown timers and fixed price logic.
Added ability to instantly buy a car if user pays immediately before auction ends.
Integrated Google Sign-In and email OTP for fast and secure onboarding.
Implemented security deposit feature for sellers to verify before listing cars.
Prevented direct contact between buyers and sellers to reduce fraud.
Ensured real-time push notifications for bidding updates, new offers, and auction results.
results: Thousands of verified users globally can now participate in car auctions from Japan.
Buyers can either bid or instantly purchase cars using fixed price feature.
Security deposit system increased seller authenticity and trust level.
Direct contact prevention significantly reduced fraudulent activities.
Streamlined user journey from sign-up to successful car purchase/export.
All data synced and secured in Firestore, with real-time updates.
Auction winners auto-notified and matched upon seller approval of bid.

info.Software: Flutter, Firebase, Dart, Firestore, Firebase Storage

factsTitle: Seamless File Sharing with One Tap
challenge: Designed and developed a Flutter-based mobile app to share files wirelessly.
Integrated Firebase Storage for temporary cloud file hosting.
Built a real-time QR code based connection system for sender and receiver.
Implemented share via link, device-to-device transfer, and offline sharing.
Ensured cross-platform support for Android and iOS.
Handled large file uploads and downloads with progress indicators.
results: Users can share files quickly via device scan or instant sharing links.
No need for login â€“ optional sign-in for cloud history and resume feature.
Transfer works on WiFi, Hotspot, or Internet with smart fallback system.
Minimalist and clean UI designed for smooth UX.
Hundreds of daily file transfers with secure encryption in transit.
Realtime transfer status and auto-delete after expiry.
